metadata.title: USN-2371-1 -- Exuberant Ctags vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Exuberant Ctags incorrectly handled certain minified js files. An attacker could use this issue to possibly cause Exuberant Ctags to consume resources, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2371-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  exuberant-ctags - 1:5.9~svn20110310-7ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
